frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Shows a dismissible dialog informing the user that a challenge was deleted, using translated text and structured popup sections.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Displays a referenced message snippet in chat replies, fetching it from cache or backend and resolving sender names.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer-only UI showing auth state and allowing react-query state refresh.

frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Shared dialog wrapper providing consistent sizing and scroll behavior around popup content.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using a theme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Checks for version mismatches on startup and triggers a safe one-time hard refresh to update the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Exposes authentication status and the user's principal derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous React Query hooks for interacting with backend user, challenge, recording, and chat data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: Hides an unwanted migration banner using targeted DOM inspection and a MutationObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Stores and toggles light/dark theme preferences using localStorage and system defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the authenticated user's challenge status through the backend actor.
